data.title: Don MacDonald - Previously held position: Rep. Brad Sherman (D-CA) (Jan. 2011-May 2024), Chief of Staff - Biography
data.meta_description: See more about Don MacDonald including contact information, congressional salary, employment history, education, family relationships and other biographical information.
data.text:
Privately Financed Travel

Donald F. MacDonald (Don) has filed disclosures indicating that one or more outside organizations has funded travel. Subscribers to LegiStorm Pro see a summary of all privately paid travel taken by Donald F. MacDonald (Don) paid for by outside interest groups, including the total travel cost, number of trips, and a convenient listing of destinations and travel sponsors. Donald F. MacDonald (Don) has filed personal financial disclosures. Subscribers to LegiStorm Pro see a summary of all personal financial disclosures filed by Donald F. MacDonald (Don), including some notable items LegiStorm editors have found on the disclosure. Click here to see more LegiStorm Pro benefits and subscribe, or log in to your Pro account.
